new_label_day.label: Number of days for which the product is considered 'new'

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

text__1.content: üí° Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

text__2.content: üí° For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/help-script-find-money-formats).

text__3.content: üí° Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](https://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: USD.

list_currencies.label: Currency codes
list_currencies.info: [See the full list of currency codes](https://www.xe.com/iso4217.php)
